channel.title: Mw2
channel.description: My brother who is 11 likes to have seizure-like attacks when he dies multiple times in a row on games. So he died on mw2 about 8 times in a row.... Starts raging like all 11 year olds do. He kicks the table which has the xbox on it and it falls on its side with mw2 still in it, of course. So, the disk gets an unreadable error then I look at it and it has about 4 rings of scratches inside of it. How can I fix this? I put toothpaste on it like an idiot, my friend told me that was actually a joke. Should I wait out mw3 or go buy another mw2 for $60? Btw the xbox is mine along with every game, he hasn't paid for shit besides a mic which the old one broke from him in another little attack. I don't know if I should buy another disk when I'm never going to get to use it.

item.title: Mw2
item.dc:creator: @Immortal_Technique Immortal Technique
item.description:
@Immortal_Technique wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:24, topic:400758”][quote author=Immortal Technique link=topic=497814.msg3641636#msg3641636 date=1309043206]
Same damn thing happened to me. I told my brother to turn it off so I could watch the telly, he puts his hand over the power button, and reaches for the controller, tips it over, broke my MW2.

I suggest just buying Black Ops or WAW.
[/quote]

Lol, I have both of those games, Black Ops is boring because I’m 15th prestige and using a sniper on that game sucks, and WaW is full of hackers.[/quote]

I only bought WAW for Zombiesss [size=2pt]Nacht der untoten sucks huge cock[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Mw2
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:20, topic:400758”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=497814.msg3641460#msg3641460 date=1309035592]
You still have to have a disk in the Xbox, but with it installed, it won’t matter if it’s scratched to Hell, or broken etc., just needs to be at least installed for it to work.
[/quote]

Awesome, thanks, I’ll try this and save $50 or however much a new game is. :)[/quote]
The game here is 20-24 dollars, and I don’t even think it’s used.
Good luck mate.

Read full topic

item.title: Mw2
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:17, topic:400758”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=497814.msg3641392#msg3641392 date=1309033000]

You can use a clean copied CD from a friend and install it to the Xbox hard drive, and that’ll work without a doubt.

I don’t know the reason for others stating it’s 50-60 dollars are Gamestop and what not, here it’s 24-30 dollars in my area?

Ok. I can install it then put in the scratched disk and it will play from the hard drive?
[/quote]
You will have to use a clean copy of the game, or at least with little scratches so the Xbox can read the disk well enough to install it to the hard drive, and yes you can do that, that’s what I’m doing for Black-Ops.[/quote]

Just today I installed Call of Duty 5, world at war, and then took the disk out and I couldn’t play, am I suppose to be able to play or not?

Read full topic

item.title: Mw2
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:16, topic:400758”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=497814.msg3641096#msg3641096 date=1309019192]
You can use a clean copied CD from a friend and install it to the Xbox hard drive, and that’ll work without a doubt.

I don’t know the reason for others stating it’s 50-60 dollars are Gamestop and what not, here it’s 24-30 dollars in my area?
[/quote]

Ok. I can install it then put in the scratched disk and it will play from the hard drive?[/quote]
You will have to use a clean copy of the game, or at least with little scratches so the Xbox can read the disk well enough to install it to the hard drive, and yes you can do that, that’s what I’m doing for Black-Ops.

Read full topic

@Fridder wrote:

owns reece:

u cnt get rid of them scrtches there called lazer bone scratches it happens when u move the xbox when its reading the disk. u should get a new disk, do NOT wait for mw3 it will be shit as it isnt made by infinity ward :’(

Lol, this is the 2nd time MW2 scratched, the first one scratched a couple days after I got it, and this one scratched a year later.
Are you 100% sure I can’t get rid of the scratches?

item.title: Mw2
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:10, topic:400758”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=497814.msg3640646#msg3640646 date=1308971484]
I thought toothpaste actually did work… it worked with like 3 discs of mine ._.

And another suggestion… don’t let your brother play (without restraints anyways…). Seriously, if he gets THAT mad over a game, he shouldn’t play. Convince your parents to not let him or something because he’ll cause some serious damage at some point…
[/quote]

Lol I might put a passcode on the xbox… Like a PIN. Sometimes it’s funny listening to him scream… Almost flipped the table and knocked the TV over along with the xbox. Little boys these days.

I took the toothpaste, put it on the disk, rubbed it in a straight line towards the edge of the CD and then wiped it off… Totally didn’t work… What did you do?[/quote]
Do it in a circle motion around the outer part of the disc.

Read full topic

item.title: Mw2
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:7, topic:400758”][quote author=Exion link=topic=497814.msg3640615#msg3640615 date=1308970294]
A new copy of MW2 is $50 at GameStop if there’s one near you. I still can’t believe it only dropped $10 and it’s been out for more than a year. Activision = greedy bastards. If you want my honest opinion, just get MW2 buffed and get Battlefield 3 instead of MW3. MW3 really is just an expansion pack for MW2 imo.
[/quote]

Can I get it buffed at GameStop, or just about any game place near me?

I’ll think about getting Battlefield 3 :p, along with Gears of War 2 because a friend suggested it, the same one who suggested using toothpaste on my disk … Ah thanks for the help though ;).[/quote]
I’m not sure if they will buff it for you, never had to do anything like that. I had the same problem with MW2 the week after I got it. Some guy came over to set something up and knocked my 360 down. I was so pissed… Good thing I was still able to exchange it for a new one, though.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Exion:

A new copy of MW2 is $50 at GameStop if there’s one near you. I still can’t believe it only dropped $10 and it’s been out for more than a year. Activision = greedy bastards. If you want my honest opinion, just get MW2 buffed and get Battlefield 3 instead of MW3. MW3 really is just an expansion pack for MW2 imo.

Can I get it buffed at GameStop, or just about any game place near me?

I’ll think about getting Battlefield 3 :p, along with Gears of War 2 because a friend suggested it, the same one who suggested using toothpaste on my disk … Ah thanks for the help though ;).

Read full topic
